item.title: Dungeon Delver
item.description: What is Dungeon Delver? Some time ago I was introduced to Godot by a colleague. Godot is an Open Source game engine with the built-in scripting language GDscript being very similar to Python. Over a weekend, I decided to download the engine and give it a go. I enjoyed how the engine structures components and how there is a friendly community surrounding it. It wasn’t long before I had the idea of building a top-down action role-playing game.
